document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: Re: proposed schedule. 
Date: Sat, 21 Sep 2019 12:57:08 +0000 
I could do Thursday afternoon 
On Sep 21, 2019, at 7:38 AM 
What about this Thursday assuming we get the proposal from BB by Tuesday ? 
Assistant U.S. 
Attorney 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: 
Date: Se tember 21 2019 at 07:21:28 EDT 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: proposed schedule. 
wrote: 
Any day next week works for me. Also in my role as Learned Counsel, and in full compliance with the ABA Guidelines, I 
will be submitting a proposed schedule for penalty phase pleadings over the weekend. 
Thanks 
Tonyricco 
----Ori inal Mess e--
From: 
To: Bruce Barket 
Cc: 
Sent Fri, Sep 20, 2019 9:15 pm 
Subject: Re: proposed schedule. 
We are free next Friday afternoon if that works for you all. 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
On Sep 20, 2019, at 12:16, Bruce Barkeawrote: 
I think we will be ready to propose a schedule sometime early next week. Is there a day and time when you 
can meet to discuss? We will send you a proposed briefing schedule ahead of the meeting. I hope to have 
ours finalized no later than Tuesday. 
EFTA00021347

Bruce A. Barket, Esq. 
Barket Epstein Kearon Aldea & LoTurco, LLP 
Garden City, NY 11530 
www.barketepstein.com 
This transmittal may be a confidential attorney client communication or may otherwise be privileged or confidential. If it 
is not clear that you are the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that you have received this transmittal in error; 
any review, dissemination, distribution or copying of this transmittal is strictly prohibited. If you suspect that you have 
received this communication in error, please notify us immediately by telephone or email and immediately delete this 
message and all its attachments 
EFTA00021348
